module.name: Call Forward
module.changelog: *14.0.1.1* UCP fixes and updates *14.0.1* UCP 14 *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9740 Redid playback structure to allow for multilingual support, and added Japanese order *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9564 UCP goes offline after changing settings *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Hint updates
